thread.title: Eugene Absher

author: KWBG
title: Eugene Absher
text:
Eugene Absher Posted on 22 October 2015 by KWBG 
BOONE, Iowaâ€”Funeral arrangements have been set for 89-year old Eugene Absher of Boone, Iowa and the Eastern Star Masonic Home in Boone, Iowa. A Graveside Service will be held Saturday, October 24, 2015 at 10:00 AM at the Squire Boone Cemetery located south of Boone, Iowa. Military Honors will be conducted by the Boone Veterans Council. Masonic Services will be conducted by Mount Olive Lodge #79 will also be conducted. Following the services, his cremains will be buried. 
A Memorial Service will be held Saturday afternoon at 1:00 PM and will be held in the Chapel of the Eastern Star Masonic Home in Boone. 
In memory of Eugene, memorials may be directed to the Eastern Star Masonic Home in Boone. 
The Schroeder Memorial Chapel at 6th and Marshall is in charge of these arrangements. Leave a Reply You must be logged in to post a comment. Boone Municipal, IA
